mobiles.name: oldstyle keeper
mobiles.long_description: The keeper of the Morris equipment is here.
mobiles.description: Her job is to set the level for this equipment.

objects.name: bells morris leggings
objects.description: A set of leggings with a dozen brass bells sewn on has been left here.

extra_descriptions.description: 'Time on the ground is time wasted.'

These are a set of sturdy leather leggings with small brass bells sewn on.
They look like the leggings worn by Morris dancers.  There is a motto tooled
into the leather.
This is a fine linen handkerchief used for ritual Morris dances.
This is a fine linen sash used for ritual Morris dances.

objects.name: staff morris
objects.description: A short, stout staff made of polished wood is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
Made from the wood of a Yule Tree, this staff is about one meter long and
highly polished.  It looks more like a ritual device than a weapon.

rooms.name: The Void
rooms.description:
You are suspended in cool electric space above a translucent plain.  You feel
synesthesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses.  The sky is the
same obsidian color as the ground and you can't find a horizon.

exits.description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

rooms.name: Road to Newfane
rooms.description:
You are on a gently curving north-south road.  On your east side a youthful
river sparkles blue and rushes in the sunlight.  On the west, green leaves and
green ferns burst against the rich brown earth.  You feel the heat of your
healthy muscles as you travel swiftly down the well-paved road.
You may recall now if you like.

exits.description: You see a village square.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

rooms.name: Newfane Village Square
rooms.description:
You are on the lawn of the village square of Newfane, resting against an oak
after your vigorous journey.  The late spring breeze feels warm and sensuous
on your body.  An Ale is in progress: you spy more than a dozen fiddlers and
hundreds of Morris Dancers dressed in white cotton and wearing colorful hats
and bells.

exits.description: You see the Road to Newfane.

rooms.name: A Large Dance Hall
rooms.description:
You are inside a large dance hall with a very polished, very slippery wooden
floor.  You see three long lines of dancers, alternating men and women, in
some sort of progressive country dance.  Two fiddlers, a flautist, and a
harpsichord player provide the music.  You hear scattered screams of joy
from the dancers.
You may recall now if you like.

exits.description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

extra_descriptions.description: The dancers have been here all night and intend to dance until dawn.

rooms.name: A Small Hall
rooms.description:
You are inside a small hall with a rough wooden floor.  You see dozens of
people in the hall chasing one poor man who is yelling at the top of
his lungs.  Wait a minute.  These people are all holding hands and smiling!
The man in front is leading them in a spiral!  They're DANCING!  And you
thought people didn't dance like this any more!
You may recall now if you like.

exits.description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

rooms.name: Road by a Pond
rooms.description:
You are passing by a large pond, almost a small lake.  You notice a small
wooden shack by the side of the road.
You may recall now if you like.

exits.description: You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.
You see a wooden church set back among the trees.

extra_descriptions.description: The shack looks hand-made by an amateur.

rooms.name: An Old Wooden Church
rooms.description:
As you enter the hall, you see the largest crowd of people you've ever seen in
your life.  They're also the noisiest crowd you've ever heard, and as they
press around you, the SWEATIEST crowd you've ever felt!  At the front of the
hall, a group of musicians are playing 'Chorus Jig'.

exits.description: You see a road by a pond.

rooms.name: Mountain Road
rooms.description:
You are following a road at the top of a mountain ridge with sky all around
you.  Distant valleys are spread out below you on both sides.  There are
many horsemen and horsewomen on this road, riding hell-for-leather out of
sheer exhilaration.  You wish you had a horse!
You may recall now if you like.

exits.description: You see several acres of thickly planted, very young Yule Trees.
You see machine dreams and taste violet phosphor.

rooms.name: Yule Tree Farm
rooms.description:
This is the Yule Tree Farm at the top of Mountain Road.  All around you,
young Yule Trees saturate your senses with dark green needles and pine
essence.

exits.description: You see a mountain ridge against the sky.

rooms.name: The Void
rooms.description:
You are suspended in cool electric space above a translucent plain.  You feel
synesthesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses.  The sky is the
same obsidian color as the ground and you can't find a horizon.
